trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs> contains information regarding exceptions or errors that occurred during a binding process.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state, and binding context.
`state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
`context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, and binding context.
`state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
`context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, binding context, and exception.
`state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
`context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that occurred during the binding.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified binding, error state and text, binding context, exception, and whether the binding should be cancelled.
`state` indicates whether the binding process was successful or an error or exception occurred.
`context` indicates whether the error occurred when updating the bound control or the data source.
The binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
The error text or exception message for errors that occurred during the binding.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that occurred during the binding.
`true` to cancel the binding and keep focus on the current control; `false` to allow focus to shift to another control.
Gets the binding associated with this occurrence of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding.BindingComplete"></xref> event.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.Binding%2A> might also be associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource.BindingComplete> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingSource> or of a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Binding"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs"></xref>.
Gets the direction of the binding operation.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteContext"></xref> values.
Gets the completion state of the binding operation.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteEventArgs.BindingCompleteState%2A> to determine if the binding was successful, or an error or exception occurred.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BindingCompleteState"></xref> values.
Gets the text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.
This property returns an empty string if no error occurred in the binding operation.
It returns the value of the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property when an exception occurs.
The text description of the error that occurred during the binding operation.
Gets the exception that occurred during the binding operation.
This property returns `null` if an exception did not occur during the binding operation.
The <xref href="System.Exception"></xref> that occurred during the binding operation.
